attributes.action: To Reject the current political system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To Reject the current political system and focus on working to dissolve the outdated system of politics in favor of technological redesign, Because many believe the illusion of democracy is an insult to our intelligents as in a  monetary system there is no such thing as true democracy and there never was the change of prime minister will have very little meaning or affect in this failed system all the time we are borrowing from the bank of england at intrest knowing you can never repay it we will always be in debt, Its time for some critical thinking and time to find a solution where profit isnt the key word and people are. i believe a resource system is the way forward geothermal power wind water etc we have the technology but it seems money is the answer and i think your wrong

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
